product_name: Sugoi Piston 200 Tri Pocket Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Go the distance in the Sugoi Piston 200 Tri Pocket Shorts. They feature compression-powered fabric, a women-specific chamois and pockets for your energy gels. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying nylon and spandex fabric slows skin and muscle vibration, which conserves energy, reduces fatigue and increases circulation. TriLite2 chamois from Sugoi combines padded comfort, micro ventilation, a quick-drying surface and a run-friendly profile. Women-specific chamois offers a short overall length and wide padding for the sit bones. Shorts also feature flatseam construction, a stretch drawsting and a comfortable waistband. Sugoi Piston200 Tri PKT shorts feature 2 stretch mesh hip pockets to conveniently stash energy foods or an MP3 player. Internal pocket stores a key or card. Closeout.
short_description: Go the distance in the Sugoi Piston 200 Tri Pocket Shorts. They feature compression-powered fabric, a women-specific chamois and pockets for your energy gels.
